title: Cultures of West Africa and the African Diaspora
description: The cultures of West African and the African Diaspora, with special attention to the intersection of Animist, Islamic and Western cultures, and the survival of African cultures in the Americas as manifested in the artistic, religious, literary, and other humanistic legacies of the African Diaspora. 4 lectures. Fulfills GE D5 except for History majors.
prerequisites: Completion of GE Area A and one course from Area D2 or D3
